title: Virginia GOP Bell is asking schools to check children's genitals before using the restroom?
subtitle: A controversial bill proposed by Virginia Mark Cole proposed a more rigorous police force than "example sex" in state school bathrooms but did not require genital examination.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: A Virginia legislator has proposed a bill to conduct physical examinations on the child ' s genitals to determine which gender-biased bathrooms they are allowed to use.
